nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor assigns the contract to an owner by settting
the original `owner` of the contract to the sender account.

@dev Look up the address of the owner.
@return the address of the owner.
nodes.name: owner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the contract owner can call this function"

arguments.value: Only the contract owner can call this function

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the contract owner can call this function"

nodes.documentation: @dev Thrown if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Checks if the calling address is the owner of the contract.
@return true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.
nodes.name: isOwner
renounceOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a new Owner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can call this function."

arguments.value: Only the owner can call this function.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can call this function."

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a new Owner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: _transferOwnership

nodes.name: transferOwnership

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can call this function."

arguments.value: Only the owner can call this function.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can call this function."

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a new Owner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: _transferOwnership

isOwner().details: Checks if the calling address is the owner of the contract.
isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

owner().details: Look up the address of the owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a new Owner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing the ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
